name: Dragalge
description: The Mock Kelp Pokémon. Their poison is strong enough to eat through the hull of a tanker, and they spit it indiscriminately at anything that enters their territory.

abilities.name: Poison Point
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit with a melee attack, roll a 1d4. On a result of 4, the attacker takes an amount of poison damage equal to this Pokémon’s proficiency modifier.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.description: On melee attacks made by this Pokémon, roll a d10 on a hit. On a result of a 10, the target is poisoned.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.description: When this Pokémon uses a move of its own type, it may roll the damage twice and choose either total.
